oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mary Chapin Carpenter Interview - Biff Collie - Tape 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Mary Chapin Carpenter (performer) conducted by Biff Collie.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mary Chapin Carpenter; Biff Collie
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Mary Chapin Carpenter discussed living in New Jersey in her youth and moving to Japan inspiring her musical passion -- (01:55) Biff Collie and Carpenter discuss the family musical influence -- (03:15) Carpenter discusses the American influence out of the United States and being taught in an international school -- (05:00) Collie and Carpenter discuss the day to day activities from youth -- (06:55) Carpenter discusses culture shock and escaping into music -- (08:06) Carpenter recalls her first song she wrote and Collie recalls a Willie Nelson story -- (08:58) Carpenter recalls first reaction to being back home to the states and a friend going to a hockey game -- (09:44) Carpenter talks of John Jennings influence in growing her confidence by playing music in bars -- (12:40) Carpenter speaks about her first opportunity of recording and pressures of gig based living -- (16:39) Carpenter talks about being an assistant and her jobs requirements -- (18:00) Carpenter discusses parental support -- (18:52) Carpenter lists her various jobs -- (19:09) Carpenter says one of her favorite spots to visit is France -- (21:11) GetaRealJobMusic publishing company is discussed (Carpenter's publishing company) -- (22:04) Carpenter named Das Bus -- (22:43) Carpenter reflects on having music on the radio -- (23:31) Carpenter speaks of her goals with her music starting out -- (24:26) Carpenter talks about endurance and longevity of items and songs -- (25:32) Carpenter Collie and Carpenter discuss familiarity to items and songwriting -- (27:04) Collie and Carpenter speak on recording and why she goes home to record -- (28:10) Carpenter speaks on traveling -- (28:51) The Birchmere is discussed -- (29:15) Carpenter talks about being injured on stage -- (30:28) Carpenter reflects discusses singing debut -- (31:57) Carpenter talks about her appreciation for singer-songwriters and artists -- (33:08) -- Carpenter talks about having free time -- (33:51) Carpenter discusses her ongoing project -- (34:31) Last quip about injury
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Carpenter, Mary Chapin, 1958-; Collie, Biff;
